name: PureMotivation
0:
”Alexa, open Pure Motivation”
”Alexa, ask Pure Motivation to play Steve Jobs”
”Alexa, ask Pure Motivation to list all speakers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pure motivation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pure Motivation is a skill designed to motivate you to reach your full potential. Speakers from all walks of life have been gathered to share their stories and advice for others pursuing their dreams.

The Pure Motivation skill for Alexa allows you to play a random quote from a number of supported speakers. You are also able to request to hear from specific people. Additionally, Alexa can read off all currently available speakers.

Just say "Alexa, open Pure Motivation" for a bit of motivation to start your day.
